## The Gap Procedure
# For the identification of phylogenetic clusters in HIV-1 sequence data

The Gap Procedure is a distance-based clustering algorithm.  This package is maintained by [Irene Vrbik](http://www.math.mcgill.ca/ivrbik/).  For an online version so the vignette [Click here](http://www.math.mcgill.ca/ivrbik/vignette.html).
